cause.description:
Russian Ministries builds Christian partnerships that touch and change lives in communities across the former Soviet Union.
Russian Ministries was founded to promote indigenous evangelism, church-planting, church growth and humanitarian aid in the former Soviet Union by developing creative and strategic partnerships between nationals and Western Christians.
1. The 1991 disintegration of the Soviet Union brought new and unprecedented opportunities for ministry.
2. Western Christians should be able to partner with indigenous ministry groups to help raise up the next generation of leaders in the former Soviet Union.
3. Through effective partnerships; churches, organizations and individual can continue tirelessly advancing the message of Christ.
cause.mission: bring new life and hope to the next generation of Russia.
cause.name: Russian Ministries
